mapper.select:
select
from consult_statistic where create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by create_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into consult_statistic (id, day_number, titile_number, evaluate_number, unevaluate_number, satisfied_number, day_satisfied_degree, weed_satisfied_degree, month_satisfied_degree, day_yawp_number, week_yawp_number, month_yawp_number, reward_number, reward_degree, first_consult_cancle_Attention_number, more_consult_cancle_Attention_number, first_consult_number, first_consult_degree, second_consult_number, second_consult_degree, more_conuslt_number, more_consult_degree, max_money, min_money, sum_money, evaluate_click_number, evaluate_click_degree, share_click_number, share_click_degree,create_date,charge_success_number,charge_message_click_number,charge_send_message_number) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{titileNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluateNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unevaluateNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{satisfiedNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daySatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weedSatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthSatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dayYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monthYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rewardNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rewardDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstConsultCancleAttentionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moreConsultCancleAttentionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstConsultNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondConsultNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moreConusltNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moreConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sumMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluateClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluateClickDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareClickDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createDate},#{chargeSuccessNumber},#{chargeMessageClickNumber},#{chargeSendMessageNumber})

mapper.update:
update consult_statistic
day_number = #{dayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
titile_number = #{titileNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluate_number = #{evaluateNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unevaluate_number = #{unevaluateNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
satisfied_number = #{satisfiedNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
day_satisfied_degree = #{daySatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weed_satisfied_degree = #{weedSatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
month_satisfied_degree = #{monthSatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
day_yawp_number = #{dayYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
week_yawp_number = #{weekYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
month_yawp_number = #{monthYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reward_number = #{rewardNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reward_degree = #{rewardDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_consult_cancle_Attention_number = #{firstConsultCancleAttentionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
more_consult_cancle_Attention_number = #{moreConsultCancleAttentionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_consult_number = #{firstConsultNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_consult_degree = #{firstConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
second_consult_number = #{secondConsultNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
second_consult_degree = #{secondConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
more_conuslt_number = #{moreConusltNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
more_consult_degree = #{moreConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_money = #{maxMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_money = #{minMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum_money = #{sumMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evaluate_click_number = #{evaluateClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluate_click_degree = #{evaluateClickDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_click_number = #{shareClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
share_click_degree = #{shareClickDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charge_success_number = #{chargeSuccessNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
charge_message_click_number = #{chargeMessageClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
charge_send_message_number = #{chargeSendMessageNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update consult_statistic set day_number = #{dayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, titile_number = #{titileNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluate_number = #{evaluateNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unevaluate_number = #{unevaluateNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, satisfied_number = #{satisfiedNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, day_satisfied_degree = #{daySatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weed_satisfied_degree = #{weedSatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_satisfied_degree = #{monthSatisfiedDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_yawp_number = #{dayYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, week_yawp_number = #{weekYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_yawp_number = #{monthYawpNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reward_number = #{rewardNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reward_degree = #{rewardDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_consult_cancle_Attention_number = #{firstConsultCancleAttentionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, more_consult_cancle_Attention_number = #{moreConsultCancleAttentionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_consult_number = #{firstConsultNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_consult_degree = #{firstConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_consult_number = #{secondConsultNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_consult_degree = #{secondConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, more_conuslt_number = #{moreConusltNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, more_consult_degree = #{moreConsultDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_money = #{maxMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_money = #{minMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum_money = #{sumMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_click_number = #{evaluateClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluate_click_degree = #{evaluateClickDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_click_number = #{shareClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_click_degree = #{shareClickDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charge_success_number = #{chargeSuccessNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, charge_message_click_number = #{chargeMessageClickNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, charge_send_message_number = #{chargeSendMessageNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from ( select count(DISTINCT(sys_user_id)) countNumber from consult_session where create_time like '${createDate}%' and flag is null UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(sys_user_id)) countNumber from consult_session UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime like '${createDate}%' and (serviceAttitude != '0') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime like '${createDate}%' and (serviceAttitude = '3' or serviceAttitude = '5') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime between #{weekBeginDate} and #{weekEndDate} and (serviceAttitude = '3' or serviceAttitude = '5') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime between #{monthBeginDate} and #{monthEndDate} and (serviceAttitude = '3' or serviceAttitude = '5') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime like '${createDate}%' and (serviceAttitude = '1') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime between #{weekBeginDate} and #{weekEndDate} and (serviceAttitude = '1') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime between #{monthBeginDate} and #{monthEndDate} and (serviceAttitude = '1') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime like '${createDate}%' and payStatus = 'success' UNION ALL SELECT count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from sys_attention where date LIKE '${createDate}%' and STATUS='1' and openid in ( select sys_user_id from consult_session where consult_number = 1 and create_time like '${createDate}%' GROUP BY sys_user_id ORDER BY null ) UNION ALL SELECT count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from sys_attention where date LIKE '${createDate}%' and STATUS='1' and openid in ( select sys_user_id from consult_session where consult_number > 1 and create_time like '${createDate}%' GROUP BY sys_user_id ORDER BY null ) UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(sys_user_id)) countNumber from consult_session where consult_number = 1 and create_time like '${createDate}%' UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(sys_user_id)) countNumber from consult_session where consult_number > 1 and create_time like '${createDate}%' UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime between #{weekBeginDate} and #{weekEndDate} and (serviceAttitude != '0') UNION ALL select count(DISTINCT(openid)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime between #{monthBeginDate} and #{monthEndDate} and (serviceAttitude != '0')) a union all select min(redPacket) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime like '${createDate}%' and redPacket is not null and redPacket !='' union all select ceil(Max(cast(redPacket as SIGNED))) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime like '${createDate}%' and redPacket is not null and redPacket !='' union all select ceil(sum(redpacket)) countNumber from customerEvaluation where createtime like '${createDate}%' and redPacket is not null and redPacket !='' union all SELECT count(*) FROM account_pay_record WHERE fee_type = 'doctorconsultpay' AND STATUS = 'success' and pay_date like '${createDate}%'

SELECT consult.date,consult.validateConsultCount,IFNULL(feedback.feedBackCount,0) feedBackCount FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') date,COUNT(DISTINCT sys_user_id) validateConsultCount from consult_session where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and flag IS NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) consult LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') date,COUNT(DISTINCT openid) feedBackCount from customerEvaluation where serviceAttitude = '1' and DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) feedback on consult.date = feedback.date

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(c.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') date,COUNT(DISTINCT c.openid) sendHeartPersonCount,round(SUM(c.redPacket),2) sendHeartMoneyCount FROM customerEvaluation c INNER JOIN sys_user su ON c.doctorid = su.id WHERE c.redPacket IS NOT NULL AND c.redPacket!='' AND c.redPacket !=0 AND c.payStatus IS NOT NULL and DATE_FORMAT(c.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(c.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')
